title: SESSION RESULT detail page Â» RACING SESSION
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to know to which RACING SESSION a SESSION RESULT belongs\
So I can find out the result's relevance (practice vs race) and the quality of the result (5th place in a field of 10 competitors vs 50 competitors)
description:
* The SESSION RESULT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected RACING SESSION.
* The RACING SESSION is presented with its name and primary information.
* The RACING SESSION contains a link to its detail page.
* The RACING SESSION has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACING SESSION connected to the SESSION RESULT then the section is not displayed at all.
